title: Sunshine province
brief_description: Presents Nelson, New Zealand’s sunshine province, settled in 1841. Shows Nelson’s sporting and tourist activities: public historical buildings, sightseeing, golfing, surf beach as well as Nelson’s agricultural industries including tobacco growing and apple orchards.
